sections.description:
A WordPress plugin that allows you to create and manage ACF Blocks using AI and an internal code editor.

Installation

  1. Download the plugin from the GitHub repository.
  2. Log in to your WordPress dashboard.
  3. Go to Plugins > Add New.
  4. Click on the Upload Plugin button, and choose the downloaded zip file.
  5. Click on Install Now and then Activate.

Updating Settings

  1. Go to Settings > ACF Block Builder.
  2. Enter your Google Gemini API Key (get it from Google AI Studio).
  3. Click on Save Changes.

Creating a New Block

  1. Go to ACF Blocks > Add New.
  2. Enter a title for the block.
  3. Enter a description for the block.
  4. Click on the Create Block button.

Editing a Block

  1. Go to ACF Blocks > Edit.
  2. Enter a title for the block.
  3. Enter a description for the block.
  4. Click on the Update Block button.

Deleting a Block

  1. Go to ACF Blocks > Delete.
  2. Click on the Delete Block button.
